title: Fort Monroe National Monument: Get Involved
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved           Get Involved       Volunteers In Parks Are you interested in volunteering at Fort Monroe? We greatly value the time and effort Volunteers In Parks (VIP) give everyday in national parks across the country. Fort Monroe National Monument operates a joint Volunteer Program with our park partner the Fort Monroe Authority (FMA). There are a wide range of VIP opportunities throughout the year. Please contact us for more information at 757-722-FORT (3678) or FMA's Volunteer Corrdinator, Joan Baker, at 757-251-2740.   Planning  Fort Monroe is in an ongoing active park planning process and is expected to continue for some time. For the latest information go to the park planning page to see planning documents, learn about the process, or make comments.
